      • contains

        boolean contains(int userIdx)
        Returns true if this list contains the specified userIdx. More formally, returns true if and only if this list contains userIdx e such that (userIdx==null ? e==null : userIdx.equals(e)).
        Parameters:
        userIdx - element whose presence in this list is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if this list contains the specified userIdx
